name: Grav-8T
description:
Navigate through obstacles on your little space-craft (the grav-8t) and land on the platform to proceed to the next area. (the game loops upon completion of the final level)

Space - Main thruster

A/D - Rotate ship

might add levels or change it in the future.... or i might use elements from it to make a new game in the future. 

This game is made while following a gamedev.tv course, The project/chapter is called "project boost"
